name: Robo Otto!
description:
• 5 possible endings!
  • More than 4,700 lines of code! (Fun fact???)
  • Form romantic or platonic relationships, so you can fully enjoy the game even if you aren't into the characters!
  • I mean, it IS a romance game, but... you do you!
  • You can name the main character!
  • Oh, wait, that's nothing special...
  • There's a protogen!
  • Might give you an existential crisis (but in a good way)
  • Did I mention that there's a protogen?

Game website: https://sites.google.com/view/robo-otto/home

Robo Otto contains some suggestive humor, partial nudity, and mild profanity, but nothing that you wouldn't see in a T for Teen game.
